Author: SnikenV
Description:
Replaces the teal swimming pool water with darker and more realistic water.

FEATURES:
- Recolored water textures and land bridges/shallows
- Waves and water reflections overhaul

3D-rendering must be ON!

INSTALLATION:
Partly manual, since modding some files (.json etc.) are not supported by the mod manager.
(1) Go to the in game mod manager (you are probably already here)
(2) Subscribe to the mod
(3) Press
Title: 18924_Darker Water
